name: LLChat
description: The SDK is a powerful tool designed to streamline the management of TCP connections and connection state handling on iOS devices. It simplifies the process of establishing and maintaining reliable TCP connections, providing robust mechanisms for tracking connection status, handling reconnections, and managing communication protocols. Ideal for real-time applications, this SDK ensures low-latency data transmission and efficient resource usage, making it a perfect solution for apps that rely on stable, continuous connectivity.
